TopicTitle: [0.14] Instant Orbit / Debris Generator with bonus Asteroid

Articles.Content:
i'm not able to get the generator to work

Do not bump old threads please. The last post was JULY. It's a general rule of thumb not to post on threads more than a month old without good reason.

Do not bump old threads please. The last post was JULY. It's a general rule of thumb not to post on threads more than a month old without good reason.

He isn't able to get the generator to work. Isn't that a good enough reason?

That's a terrible reason. When projects are months old, and not being updated, they stop working when new versions come out. The best thing to do in a situation like this is to PM the author directly.

The project is old and apparently dead. The title should clue you in as to why it doesn't work in 0.16.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
